noun.definition: An educational talk to an audience, especially to students in a university or college.
noun.example: In this lecture, I will cover the basics of quantum mechanics.

noun.definition: A long serious speech, especially one given as a reprimand.
noun.example: My father gave me a lecture on the importance of punctuality.

verb.example: He lectures on history at the university.
She lectured him about his bad manners.

usage_examples: The professor gave a fascinating lecture.
Stop lecturing me like I'm a child.
